name: 邱志洲
objective:
本課程將介紹基於神經網路的深度學習技術及其在商情預測上之應用， 主要內容包括：（1）深度學習和神經網路的基本概念和演算法；（2）深度學習的主流結構、啟動函數及正則化技術；（3）電腦視覺與自然語言處理技術應用案例；（4）深度學習主流結構的商情預測應用。通過課程的學習，同學們可瞭解神經網路基本概念；掌握深度學習中主要網路結構的基本概念和相關演算法；瞭解具體應用領域的背景知識；應用相關深度學習技術於商情預測。
This course will give a full picture of deep learning techniques and its application in business forecasting. Content includes: (1) basic concepts and algorithms of deep learning and neural networks; (2) popular network structures, activation functions, and regularization techniques; (3) principle and applications of computer vision and natural language processing. (4) applications of popular network structures in business forecasting. By learning this course, students will consolidate the basic concepts of neural networks; master the basic concepts and related algorithms of the main network structure in deep learning; understand the background knowledge of deep learning techniques with specific application fields; and understanding how to apply the main network structure in business forecasting.
